text: This is a list of rivers in Ghana. == A == Afram River, Ankobra River, Anum River == B == Bia River, Birim River, Black Volta == D == Densu River, Daka River == M == Mo River == N == Nini River == O == Ofin River, Oti River == P == Pra River ==S == Sene River Sesili River == T == Tano River == V == Volta River == W == White Volta == References == * Rivers and Lakes of Ghana Countries Studies, U.S. Library of Congress, Accessed 2010-07-04 Ghana Ghana Category:Geography of Ghana Rivers
title: List of rivers of Ghana
